summary: Project involves a live, mobile-responsive streaming experience with planned layout refinements and continuous playback behavior.

existing_features.title: Ensure the live audio stream continuously plays and automatically recovers from interruptions unless the user has explicitly paused playback. Add a dedicated "user intent" state (e.g., userWantsToPlay) that is set to true only when the user initiates play and set to false when the user pauses (including sleep-timer-triggered pauses), and use it to prevent any auto-resume/auto-reconnect logic from restarting playback after an intentional pause.

new_feature_requests.summary: Refine/optimize layout for smaller screens (mobile responsiveness improvements)
Ensure the stream plays continuously unless the user explicitly pauses it

projectName: Ensure live audio stream plays continuously unless user pauses
